FuncDef:
The wtr command sets a wait-to-restore (WTR) time for a BFD session.
The undo wtr command restores the default value. The wtr command sets a wait-to-restore (WTR) time for a BFD session. The undo wtr command restores the default value. By default, the value is 0, indicating no waiting.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a WTR time for a BFD session.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 60, in minutes.

ExtraInfo: If a BFD session flaps, you can run this command to decrease service flapping caused by the BFD session.
